Initializer# init(style:locale:)

iOS 15.0+iPadOS 15.0+Mac Catalyst 15.0+macOS 12.0+tvOS 15.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 8.0+

```
init(
    style: PersonNameComponents.FormatStyle.Style = .medium,
    locale: Locale = .autoupdatingCurrent
)
```
